flawed_nl_solution:
June had 76 stickers and was given 25 from her grandparents so she had 76 + 25 = <<76+25=101>>101 stickers
Bonnie had 63 stickers and was given 25 from her grandparents so she had 63 + 25 = <<63+25=90>>90 stickers
June had 101 stickers and Bonnie had 90 stickers so together, they had 101 + 90 = <<101+90=191>>191 stickers
#### 191

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 88, not 90. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
